<title level="1" right="Spell 10" pfs="Standard">[Summon Kaiju](/Spells.aspx?ID=1009)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Rare" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=137" />
<trait label="Conjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=33" />
<trait label="Incarnate" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=388" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Secrets of Magic](/Sources.aspx?ID=96) pg. 133 <sup>1.1</sup></row>

**Tradition**
[Primal](/SpellLists.aspx?Tradition=4)

<row gap="medium">

<row gap="tiny">
<row>**Cast**</row>
<row><actions string="Three Actions" /></row>
<row>[material](/Rules.aspx?ID=282), [somatic](/Rules.aspx?ID=283), [verbal](/Rules.aspx?ID=284)</row>
</row>

</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Range** 500 feet

</row>

<row gap="medium">

**Duration** until the end of your next turn
</row>

</column>

---

You briefly conjure a kaiju, a massive, rampaging monster with a unique name and legendary reputation. It rises from its secluded lair to annihilate your foes. The summoned kaiju occupies the space of a Gargantuan creature. When you Cast this Spell, choose one of the kaiju below to summon.

<title level="2">Secrets of Magic</title>

- **Agmazar the Star Titan** Speed 100 feet, climb 50 feet; **Arrive** ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117), [negative](/Traits.aspx?ID=118)) _Channel Void_ Each foe in a 100-foot emanation takes 16d8 negative energy damage with a [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Fortitude save; **Depart** ([transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) _Gravitic Repulsion_ Each foe in a 50-foot emanation is [pushed](/Rules.aspx?ID=451) 100 feet away unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save.
- **Agyra, the Forever Storm** Speed 80 feet, fly 200 feet; **Arrive** ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) _Breath of a Thousand Storms_ Agyra shoots two 1,200-foot lines of electricity, one from each of her heads. The lines can't overlap. Each creature along one of the lines takes 6d12 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, the creature is also [slowed 1](/Conditions.aspx?ID=35) for 1 round (or for 1 minute on a critical failure); **Depart** ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [sonic](/Traits.aspx?ID=147)) _Thunderous Blast_ Each creature within a 100-foot emanation takes 6d10 sonic damage with a basic Reflex save, and is also knocked [prone](/Conditions.aspx?ID=31) on a failed save.
- **Bezravnis, the Inferno Below** Speed 100 feet, burrow 100 feet; **Arrive** ([earth](/Traits.aspx?ID=55), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) _Burrow from the Earth's Heart_ Bezravnis explodes from the ground where it was summoned, causing all creatures in a 50-foot emanation to take 8d12 bludgeoning damage with a basic Reflex save. This potentially collapses structures with the collapse effect of the [_earthquake_](/Spells.aspx?ID=95) spell, except there is no chance of falling into a fissure; **Depart** _Web Hurricane_ Bezravnis departs with a hurricane of webbing. All creatures within a 50-foot emanation must succeed at a Reflex save or take a â€“20-foot circumstance penalty to its Speeds until it [Escapes](/Actions.aspx?ID=79) (or is [immobilized](/Conditions.aspx?ID=24) until it escapes on a critical failure). The Escape DC is your spell DC.
- **Mogaru, the Final King** Speed 100 feet, swim 100 feet; **Arrive** ([auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16), [enchantment](/Traits.aspx?ID=61), [mental](/Traits.aspx?ID=106)) _Trance of the King's Melody_ Mogaru manifests with a burst of the song that summoned him, requiring all foes within 60 feet who can hear him to attempt a Will save, leaving them [stunned 3](/Conditions.aspx?ID=36) on a failure; **Depart** ([evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65), [fire](/Traits.aspx?ID=72)) _Volcanic Breath_ Mogaru unleashes his scorching breath in a 120-foot cone. Each creature in the area takes 10d6 fire damage with a basic Reflex save. On a failure, it also takes 4d6 [persistent fire damage](/Conditions.aspx?ID=29).
- **Vorgozen, the Shapeless Feeder** Speed 50 feet, climb 50 feet, swim 100 feet; **Arrive** ([necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) _Pollute Magic_ Vorgozen's foul presence pollutes magic around her. Each of your enemies within a 60-foot emanation that are under the effects of a spell must attempt a Fortitude save. On a failure, the creature is [sickened 2](/Conditions.aspx?ID=34). Any of your enemies that Casts a Spell within 60 feet of Vorgozen must attempt a Fortitude save with the same effects unless it's already sickened; **Depart** ([acid](/Traits.aspx?ID=3), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) _Beam of Purest Vitriol_ Each creature in a 1,200-foot line takes 10d6 acid damage and 10d6 bludgeoning damage with a basic Fortitude save.
- **Yarthoon, the Moon Grub** Speed 60 feet, burrow 100 feet, fly 100 feet, swim 100 feet; **Arrive** ([cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) _Algid Beam Barrage_ Yarthoon fires countless beams, targeting each of your enemies within 200 feet of it. The beams deal 10d6 cold damage with a basic Reflex save; **Depart** ([cold](/Traits.aspx?ID=27), [conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [water](/Traits.aspx?ID=165)) _Frostbite Mist_ Chilling mist surges out in a 100-foot burst centered on Yarthoon and remains for 1 minute. This mist has the effects of [_obscuring mist_](/Spells.aspx?ID=210), plus any creature within the area at the end of its turn take 5d6 cold damage with a basic Fortitude save.

<title level="2">Monsters of Myth</title>

- **Ebeshra, the Winged Razor** Speed 75 feet, fly 100 feet; **Arrive** ([conjuration](/Traits.aspx?ID=33), [teleportation](/Traits.aspx?ID=156)) _Planar Draw_ Each foe in a 100-foot emanation is pulled 50 feet towards the center, unless it succeeds at a Fortitude save. Creatures that fail and reach the center take 10d6 bludgeoning damage; **Depart** ([electricity](/Traits.aspx?ID=56), [evocation](/Traits.aspx?ID=65)) _Storm Discharge_ Each foe in a 240-foot line takes 12d8 electricity damage with a basic Reflex save
